description:
Conan, Ran, Heiji, and Kazuha have come to Yadori Village in Shizuoka to help excavate the buried treasure of Tokugawa. At night, Yasukatsu is murdered. On his back are scratches that look as though he was attacked by a wild beast, and Hajime panicks over the possibility of it being a Nue. The members of the group agree to wait in their rooms until the police arrive while Conan, Heiji, and Densuke keep an eye on them from the forest. Later, an eerie cry rings throughout the area again, and the field Conan and his friends are standing in begins catching fire all over the place. Then a scream is heard coming from the hotel...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conan and Heiji`s Nue Legend (Scratch Arc)
Conan to Heiji no Nue Densetsu (Tsumeato Hen)
Conan, Heiji et la légende du Nue (2e partie : Les griffures)
أسطورة كونان و هيجي عن وحش النو (آثار المخالب)
コナンと平次の鵺伝説 (爪跡編)
